connector.description: Websocket endpoints for communicating with clients

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.resourceU.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.resourceUri
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.resourceU.description: The name of the websocket channel to use.

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxBinary.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxBinaryMessageSize
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxBinary.description: Can be used to set the size in bytes that the websocket created by the websocketServlet may be accept before closing. (Default is -1 - or unlimited).

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bridgeErr.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bridgeErr.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sessionSu.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sessionSupport
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sessionSu.description: Whether to enable session support which enables HttpSession for each http request.

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.subprotoc.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.subprotocol
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.subprotoc.description: Comma-separated list of subprotocols that are supported by the application.

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.lazyStart.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.lazyStartProducer
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.lazyStart.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message).

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sendTimeo.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sendTimeout
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.sendTimeo.description: Timeout in millis when sending to a websocket channel. The default timeout is 30000 (30 seconds).

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bufferSiz.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bufferSize
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.bufferSiz.description: Set the buffer size of the websocketServlet

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxIdleTi.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxIdleTime
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.maxIdleTi.description: SetSet the time in ms that the websocket created by the websocketServlet may be idle before closing.

camel.kamelet.websocket-source.allowedOr.name: camel.kamelet.websocket-source.allowedOrigins
camel.kamelet.websocket-source.allowedOr.description: The CORS allowed origins. Use to allow all.
